mapper.select: SELECT productId, description AS productName, price FROM product WHERE categoryId = 3 ORDER BY description
SELECT productId, description AS productName, price FROM product WHERE categoryId = #{categoryId} ORDER BY description
SELECT productId, description AS productName, IFNULL(price, 0) AS price FROM product WHERE productId = #{id} AND categoryId = 3

SELECT p.productId AS "productId", p.price AS "price", p.description AS "productName" FROM client_product cp JOIN product p ON cp.productId = p.productId WHERE cp.clientId = #{clientId} ORDER BY p.description
